page.title: 05SPECIAL EVENTS.
page.content: Most of this area we have called the{ {West End of Clevedon}is sea and farmland so there are not many events. At {Mary Elton Primary School }there are Christmas and summer fetes and car boot sales.Outside clubs for judo and keep fit are also held at school. At{St.Andrew's Church}they have a church centre which you can hire out for parties. The{Scouts}have a market sometimes which is held in{Marshall's Field}or the {Salthouse Fields }which are local recreation fields. There is a {BMX Club}called the { {Clevedon Comets}which is held behind the sports centre. In the sports centre they have badminton clubs and { {gym tots}which is a gymnastics club for little children.
